species.name: wooper
descriptions: A mucous membrane covers its body. Touching it barehanded will cause a shooting pain.
It lives in cold water, half burying itself in mud at the bottom to sleep.
This Pokémon lives in cold water. It will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.
When it walks around on the ground, it coats its body with a slimy, poisonous film.
When the temperature cools in the evening, they emerge from water to seek food along the shore.

abilities.name: damp
abilities.effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

abilities.name: water-absorb
abilities.effect: Absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

abilities.name: unaware
abilities.effect: Ignores other Pokémon's stat modifiers for damage and accuracy calculation.
